docs.lead_paragraph: Of serious presidential candidates, and even of presidents, Americans demand constant reassurance that their country, their achievements and their values are extraordinary.

headline.seo: Candidates and the Truth About America

docs.abstract: News analysis; self-censorship produced by belief in American exceptionalism is bipartisan, as shown by both Pres Obama and Mitt Romney declining to address with blunt honesty some of America's more enduring problems.
docs.snippet: Of serious presidential candidates, and even of presidents, Americans demand constant reassurance that their country, their achievements and their values are extraordinary.

headline.main: Second Presidential Debate Fact-Checks and Updates

docs.abstract: In a town-hall-style format, President Obama and Mitt Romney squared off on Tuesday night in Hempstead, N.Y., for the second of three presidential debates.
docs.snippet: In a town-hall-style format, President Obama and Mitt Romney squared off on Tuesday night in Hempstead, N.Y., for the second of three presidential debates.
